title: Replace Memories stock images with newly generated non-stock assets

requirements.summary: Generate three new 300x200 JPG non-stock images and update MemoriesStep to reference them while keeping layout, captions, and behavior unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: MemoriesStep renders 3 cards with the same captions and layout as before.

The images used in MemoriesStep are NOT the current files `/assets/generated/memory-1.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-3.dim_300x200.jpg` and instead use newly generated non-stock assets.
All three images load correctly in the browser and remain static across refreshes (no upload UI and no localStorage-based overrides).

file_operations.description: Add newly generated non-stock JPG asset (300x200) per imageRequirements edit: memory-1.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-1-v2.dim_300x200.jpg.
Add newly generated non-stock JPG asset (300x200) per imageRequirements edit: memory-2.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-2-v2.dim_300x200.jpg.
Add newly generated non-stock JPG asset (300x200) per imageRequirements edit: memory-3.dim_300x200.jpg > memory-3-v2.dim_300x200.jpg.

Update the static PERMANENT_IMAGES paths to use `/assets/generated/memory-1-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-2-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, and `/assets/generated/memory-3-v2.dim_300x200.jpg` while keeping existing captions array, card structure, layout classes, and button behavior unchanged.

requirements.summary: Audit and remove any remaining placeholder/stock-image references, ensuring Valentine flow images come from bundled static assets only.
acceptanceCriteria: No references to `via.placeholder.com/300x200` remain in the frontend codebase.
All UI-visible images used by the Valentine flow are loaded from bundled static assets (no external placeholder/stock URLs).

file_operations.description: Update any legacy/default Memories image paths to match the new bundled static assets (`/assets/generated/memory-1-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-2-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-3-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`) and ensure no placeholder/stock URL references (including via.placeholder.com/300x200) remain in this compatibility hook.
Re-check the MemoriesStep for any accidental reintroduction of placeholder/stock URLs and ensure only the new bundled static asset paths are referenced (no external URLs).

requirements.summary: Update deployment checklist to reference the new Memories image asset paths.
acceptanceCriteria: The checklist lists the three updated Memories image paths that are actually used by the app.
Checklist text remains in English and the rest of the checklist remains unchanged except where required for the updated image paths.

file_operations.description: In the Post-Deployment Verification section, replace the three Memories image paths with the new ones actually used by the app: `/assets/generated/memory-1-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-2-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, `/assets/generated/memory-3-v2.dim_300x200.jpg`, leaving all other checklist content unchanged.
